ancient_warrior.name: Ancient Warrior
ancient_warrior.description: Descended from legendary warriors, you gain increased physical power.

uniqueAbility.name: Warrior's Rage
uniqueAbility.description: Increases attack damage by 25% when health drops below 50%

arcane_scholar.name: Arcane Scholar
arcane_scholar.description: Your bloodline flows with magical energy, enhancing your spellcasting.

uniqueAbility.name: Arcane Mastery
uniqueAbility.description: Spells cost 20% less mana and deal 15% more damage

shadow_assassin.name: Shadow Assassin
shadow_assassin.description: Born from darkness, you strike from the shadows with deadly precision.

uniqueAbility.name: Shadow Strike
uniqueAbility.description: Critical hits have a 30% chance to deal double damage

divine_guardian.name: Divine Guardian
divine_guardian.description: Blessed by the gods, you protect your allies with divine power.

uniqueAbility.name: Divine Protection
uniqueAbility.description: When health drops below 30%, gain a shield equal to 50% of max health

beast_master.name: Beast Master
beast_master.description: Your connection to nature allows you to command beasts and heal wounds.

uniqueAbility.name: Nature's Bond
uniqueAbility.description: Regenerate 2% of max health per second

dragon_kin.name: Dragon Kin
dragon_kin.description: Ancient dragon blood flows through your veins, granting fire resistance and power.

uniqueAbility.name: Dragon's Breath
uniqueAbility.description: Attacks have a 20% chance to deal fire damage equal to 50% of attack power

frostborn.name: Frostborn
frostborn.description: Born in the frozen wastes, you command the power of ice and cold.

uniqueAbility.name: Frost Armor
uniqueAbility.description: Taking damage has a 25% chance to slow the attacker by 50% for 3 seconds

lightning_touched.name: Lightning Touched
lightning_touched.description: Struck by lightning as a child, you now channel electrical energy.

uniqueAbility.name: Chain Lightning
uniqueAbility.description: Attacks have a 15% chance to chain to nearby enemies for 50% damage

void_walker.name: Void Walker
void_walker.description: You have walked between dimensions, gaining otherworldly powers.

uniqueAbility.name: Void Step
uniqueAbility.description: Taking fatal damage instead reduces you to 1 health and teleports you 200 units away (60s cooldown)

passiveEffects.description: 2% of damage dealt is returned as health
